campaigns.name: Summer Glow Collection Launch
campaigns.description: Launch campaign for our new Summer Glow Collection featuring SPF-infused makeup and skincare.

campaigns.name: 30-Day Fitness Challenge
campaigns.description: Promote our new workout app with a 30-day fitness challenge for influencers and their followers.
campaigns.requirements: Daily stories documenting progress, weekly posts, final transformation Reel

campaigns.name: Travel Essentials Package
campaigns.description: Feature our premium luggage and travel accessories in authentic travel content.
campaigns.requirements: 3 travel vlogs featuring products, 6 Instagram posts, 10 stories

campaigns.name: Holiday Recipes with TastyBites
campaigns.description: Create holiday recipes using TastyBites ingredients and meal kits.
campaigns.requirements: 4 recipe videos, 8 Instagram posts, discount code sharing

campaigns.name: Spring Collection Showcase
campaigns.description: Feature pieces from our Spring Collection in fashion-forward content.
campaigns.requirements: 6 outfit posts, 3 styling videos, 12 stories with swipe-up links
